product_name: Maui Jim Palms Women's Polarized Sunglasses
long_description: Provide shade for your eyes from the sun's harmful rays with these Maui Jim Palms sunglasses featuring PolarizedPlus2(R) technology. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. SuperThin lenses are 20% thinner than conventional laminated polarized lenses, and they provide crystal clear optics and scratch resistance. Grilamid lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Wrap around, rectangular shape is ideal for round, oval and oblong face sizes. Lenses and frames feature a saltwater effectiveness treatment rendering them safe for use in saltwater. Anti-corrosive nickel/silver spring hinge. Frames feature wire-core temples for easy adjustability and a secure fit. Built-in nose pads prevent slippage, providing reliable grip during hot weather. Includes a protective case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: Provide shade for your eyes from the sun's harmful rays with these Maui Jim Palms sunglasses featuring PolarizedPlus2(R) technology.
